title: Command & Conquer: Red Alert 3 - Uprising

notes: The game takes a long time to start; add "127.0.0.1 files.ea.com" to /etc/hosts, as the game is trying to fetch "Comrade News" and waiting for a timeuut.
title: Command & Conquer: Red Alert 3 - Uprising

gpu: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1070 With Max-Q Design
notes: Runs perfectly fine with high framerates on Ultra High settings. Just note that you sometimes can't change video settings while in a match.
title: Command & Conquer: Red Alert 3 - Uprising
